## ACOUSTIC\_INFO\_MODULE variable

Token used to require the \[\[WchInfo\]\] service

 PromiseLike<UrlConfig>

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ACOUSTIC_INFO_MODULE = "wch-info"
```
